Kopernio | London | Full-time, On Site | https://kopernio.com

If you cherish curiosity and ingenuity; if you are not afraid to stand by your decisions and act with humility; if you want to build the tools that help scientists shine, then this is the team for you.

We are helping to advance human knowledge by making research more accessible. Our vision is to form the backbone for scientific communication and facilitate the seamless spread of scholarly research.

We're hiring for several positions, but are especially keen to fill the following:

- Front End Front-End Engineer (Web Extensions)

- Product Designer (UX / UI)

To see all roles please visit: http://kopernio.com/careers

We are nimble and have the freedom (and background) of a startup, but have recently been acquired so have the resources (legal, IT, etc.) of an enterprise and are perfectly placed to build something amazing!
